      Classes in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.lspi that implement LearningAgent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LSPI
      This class implements the optimized version of last squares policy iteration [1] (runs in quadratic time of the number of state features).

    • Uses of LearningAgent in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.modellearning.rmax

      Classes in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.modellearning.rmax that implement LearningAgent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PotentialShapedRMax
      Potential Shaped RMax [1] is a generalization of RMax in which a potential-shaped reward function is used to provide less (but still admissible) optimistic views of unknown state transitions.

    • Uses of LearningAgent in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa

      Classes in burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.tdmethods.vfa that implement LearningAgent 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApproximateQLearning
      An abstract implementation of Q-learning with value function approximation and support for using experience replay and the use of stale Q-functions to use for the target Q-value, as described in the DQN work [1].
      class  GradientDescentQLearning
      An implementation of Gradient Descent Q-learning.
      class  GradientDescentSarsaLam
      Gradient Descent SARSA(\lambda) implementation [1].
